title: A Plant through the seasons: apple tree
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and John Walker
brief_description: Shows the annual life cycle of an apple tree. Investigates adaptations for growth in temperate climates, flower, seed and fruit formation and dormancy.
